thread.section_title: Supersaver.no omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av Supersaver.no | www.supersaver.no
thread.title: Vagif Abilov

author: Vagif Abilov
title: Vagif Abilov
text: The service is good, I often use it when booking flights. What is a bit irritating is the number of extra paid options displayed on the way to checkout, each one requiring explicit answer "yes". And it's not possible to just choose once "I only want my ticket, no extras", you have to go through a ton of stuff like "flexible ticket", "insurance", "even better insurance" etc. I wish Supersaver made this rubbish easier to avoid.
